title: Bug 120216: Group dialog does not show up when dataset is not set.
description: The group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set.
OB: An error is shown instead of the group dialog when the dataset is not set.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed when the dataset is not set.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a table report item. 
2. Do not set the dataset for the table.
3. Try creating a new table group.
